posts_list.title: Israel and missionary work
posts_list.author: Mose
posts_list.content: What are the specificities  of Israel as a missionary land? Since this is the only Jewish country in the world, with a large muslim minority, how would you approach the missionary work?         What is the percentage of Christians there?

posts_list.title: Reducers
posts_list.author: Francois
posts_list.content: They are useful for sure. But for religion, I'm not sure... That's an open question, I'd say. One should try!

posts_list.title: Korea
posts_list.author: Simon
posts_list.content: Nobody wants to read the bible in czech in Korea. Don't even try.... I've wasted a whole month trying to preach around.
